item.title: Successfully Delivered Project
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Bonus Announcement – Yadvinder:- did great job to grab one recent job related to Map and printing task, hence , based on his fruitful efforts Similarly, Manpreet:-complete that task with in committed timeframe, we appreciate that great effort Thats a great eg. of team work! thanks.

The post Successfully Delivered Project appeared first on Percept Systems.
item.content:encoded:
Bonus Announcement –

Yadvinder:- did great job to grab one recent job related to Map and printing task, hence , based on his fruitful efforts

Similarly, Manpreet:-complete that task with in committed timeframe, we appreciate that great effort
Thats a great eg. of team work! thanks.

The post Successfully Delivered Project appeared first on Percept Systems.

item.title: Employee of the month July 2019 Reward
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Manpreet:-We applaud the determination and effort you have demonstrated during last assigned Related to Map and Printing Task. We look forward to seeing all of the great things we know you will accomplish in the upcoming time! Thanks for great Efforts! Varinder:-We applaud the determination and effort you made to crack – Memory Leakage Issue…

The post Employee of the month July 2019 Reward appeared first on Percept Systems.
item.content:encoded:
Manpreet:-We applaud the determination and effort you have demonstrated during last assigned Related to Map and Printing Task. We look forward to seeing all of the great things we know you will accomplish in the upcoming time!
Thanks for great Efforts!

Varinder:-We applaud the determination and effort you made to crack – Memory Leakage Issue on OD.
We look forward to seeing all of the great things we know you will accomplish in the upcoming time!
Thanks for great Efforts!

The post Employee of the month July 2019 Reward appeared first on Percept Systems.
